mapper.select: SELECT BL.BRAND_LINEUP_IDX ,BL.BRAND_LINEUP_NAME ,BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX ,BL.BRAND_PURPOSE_IDX ,BL.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_IDX ,BL.BRAND_SIMPLE_TERMS_EXPLAIN ,TO_CHAR(BL.BRAND_TERMS_EXPLAIN) BRAND_TERMS_EXPLAIN ,BL.CATEGORY_IDX ,BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_IMAGE_IDX ,BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_IMAGE_NAME ,BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_IMAGE_EXT ,BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_SFILE_NAME ,BLR.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_NAME ,BM.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_NAME ,BM.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_EXPLAIN ,BMI.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IMAGE_IDX ,BMI.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IMAGE_NAME ,BMI.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IMAGE_EXT ,BMI.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_SFILE_NAME ,BP.BRAND_PURPOSE_NAME FROM BRAND_LINEUP BL LEFT JOIN BRAND_LINEUP_IMAGE BLI ON BL.BRAND_LINEUP_IDX = BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_IDX LEFT JOIN BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IMAGE BMI ON BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX = BMI.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX JOIN BRAND_MANUFACTURER BM ON BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX = BM.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX JOIN BRAND_PURPOSE BP ON BL.BRAND_PURPOSE_IDX = BP.BRAND_PURPOSE_IDX JOIN BRAND_LINEUP_RANKS BLR ON BL.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_IDX = BLR.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_IDX WHERE BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX = #{BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX}
